trans-unit.source: Retrieves the command-line string for the specified process

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the command-line string for the specified process

target.mrk: Retrieves the command-line string for the specified process

trans-unit.source: [optional] The PID of the process. Default (0) is the current process.
Empty string and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: This function uses undocumented API functions and may stop working properly in future versions of Windows.

trans-unit.source: Using this function for some processes may require full access rights. Use _WinAPI_AdjustTokenPrivileges()
